settings.richtext:
PAYMENT POLICY

Method of payment accepted is:
1. Bank transfer to BCA indonesia
2. Paypal
3. Credit card

SHIPPING

Peggy Hartanto will not be responsible for any fees charged by customs or other tax authorities. If a customer refuses any shipments from Peggy Hartanto the customer will remain responsible for all of the original shipping and handling charges, duties, taxes and customs charges incurred upon receiving their order as well as all of the costs associated with returning the package to Peggy Hartanto, and if agreed, costs returning the package back to buyer.

RETURN & EXCHANGE

Return is given under a condition of the received item(s) damaged or defected. In case of damaged or repair, and buyer requests for a replacement, the purchased item(s) must be returned back to seller in order to fully get a new replacement.

We advise customers to check garments thoroughly upon delivery before removing any attached tags. If you need to return  your purchase please contact us at contact@peggyhartanto.com

Any request for return should indicate the reason for return and must be made to Peggy Hartanto within 48 hours of receiving the delivery. Returned goods are accepted 15 days from the date delivery was received at buyer's place. Items received outside this period of time will not be accepted for return. Please choose the courier and shipping methods accordingly. Returned goods must be unworn, have all swing tags attached and be in their original condition.

We recommend garments to be returned via registered post. Please remember to record the tracking number. We cannot be held responsible for goods that are lost or damaged in transit. The postage costs for returning goods are the customer’s responsibility and will be reimbursed only in the case of damaged, faulty or incorrectly supplied goods.

Please note sale items cannot be returned or exchanged.

CANCELLING THE ORDER

We do not do any refund, except for order cancelling, with below procedure. Orders can be cancelled either by the store or customer anytime prior to the store’s preparing the order for shipment. This can only occur within the next 24 hours after receiving your order confirmation email. If a store cancels your order either due to stock unavailability or they are unable to process your order request, a refund will be automatically processed for that item or full order back in to your nominated paypal/bank account from which the original payment was made. You will receive an order cancelled confirmation.
